description:
The main aim of the course is to give you working ways of creating accompaniment patterns, which you can use in each music style.

You’ll pass the way from studying simple accompanying methods to complicated – such as arpeggio combinations, ostinato patterns, melodic figurations and many others.

During the studying course you’ll know such kinds methods of creating accompaniment:

  • Simple Block

  • Bass and Chords

  • Ostinato

  • Figurations

  • Style pattern

  • Latino pattern

and others.

You’ll get the skills for accompaniment creating and you’ll know on the base which laws the musical fabric of each composition is interacting.

You be able to use these known methods for:

  • Creating a party for you instrument
  • Working on the arrangement
  • During the music creating
  • Improvisation
  • Creating songs
title: Making Accompanement: step by step
